recipesJson.name: Goddessy
recipesJson.author: Dezy
recipesJson.description: Someone I know asked me to mix her up a strawberry banana smoothie and here it is. This I must say has me hooked. I have a hard time vaping anything with strawberry and i havent put it down.

reviews.text: This is amazing.  I think the Greek yogurt is the ingredient that makes this taste like a real smoothie.  Balance between banana and strawberry is spot on.  Love it.  ADV material!
